overview: John Hannon’s latest role was CFO & COO of Premise Corporation where he successfully led a Series B round of $2.0m and a successful merger with Eclipsys for $38.5m. John has held a series of management and executive positions with Honeywell, General Datacom, ADC Telecommunications, Sahara Networks, Ascend Communications, Lucent Technologies and MSA Venture Partners. Prior to Premise John served as CFO and COO of Mangrove Systems, Inc. which was sold to Carrier Access in March of 2007. Mangrove Systems designed next generation switches for 3G and 4G wireless network providers. As VP and General Manager of Ascend’s Broadband Access group John was responsible for research and development, product management, SQA, division revenue and expense goals. John’s accomplishments include increasing revenues from a few hundred thousand to over $60M and the introduction of three additional product platforms. Ascend Communications was sold to Lucent Technologies in June, 1999. John earned an MBA and BS-Finance at Suffolk University in Boston, MA.
